text: Wilderness Safaris is an ecotourism operator, headquartered in Gaborone, Botswana. It operates camps and mobile safaris across eight countries: Botswana, Kenya, Namibia, South Africa, Rwanda, Zambia and Zimbabwe. Known for its ongoing conservation work, the company is helping to conserve some 33 species on the IUCN Red List and lists some 2.5 million hectares as being under protection. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Organizations established in 1983 Category:Ecotourism Category:Charity fundraisers Category:Community- building organizations Category:Companies of Botswana
title: Wilderness Safaris
